mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, genre, director, cast, release_year, duration, rating FROM videos WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
SELECT id, title, description, genre, director, cast, release_year, duration, rating FROM videos LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO videos (title, description, genre, director, cast, release_year, duration, rating) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{cast}, #{release}, #{duration}, #{rating})
